text: {| |} The Hatch-class lifeboat was part of the A-class of lifeboats formerly operated by the Royal National Lifeboat Institution of the United Kingdom and Ireland. It was essentially a Dell Quay Dory modified for RNLI use. It was replaced by the Atlantic 21. ==Fleet== {|class="wikitable" ! Op. No. ! Old Op. No. ! Built ! In service !
